includedAssets.title: Lethal Weapon
includedAssets.synopsis: The buddy cop flick to which all others aspire. Richard Donner's rip-roaring thriller stars Danny Glover as Sergeant Murtaugh, a veteran detective whose plans for a low-key end to his career are blown out of the water when he's partnered with Mel Gibson's suicidal Martin Riggs, the loosest cannon in the LAPD. With breakneck direction, Mel at his maddest and a script so macho it'll give you stubble rash, it's like downing two pints of espresso on a bungee jump.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Veteran cop Danny Glover and suicidal young maverick Mel Gibson team up in the quest to thwart a drug-smuggling operation.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The buddy cop flick to which all others aspire. Richard Donner's rip-roaring thriller stars Danny Glover as Sergeant Murtaugh, a veteran detective whose plans for a low-key end to his career are blown out of the water when he's partnered with Mel Gibson's suicidal Martin Riggs, the loosest cannon in the LAPD. With breakneck direction, Mel at his maddest and a script so macho it'll give you stubble rash, it's like downing two pints of espresso on a bungee jump.
includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, sex, violence

includedAssets.title: Lethal Weapon 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover are back as wise-cracking, crime-busting partners Riggs and Murtaugh in this blistering, all-action sequel. This time they tangle with evil South Africans - headed by slimy Joss Ackland - running drugs under the shelter of diplomatic immunity. Joe Pesci makes a big impression as Leo Getz, a snitch who never shuts up ("Whatever you want - Leo Getz!" ) while perennial starlet Patsy Kensit plays Riggs' Africaaner love interest.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Riggs and Murtaugh come up against crooked South African diplomats using their immunity as cover. Joe Pesci provides the comic relief.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover are back as wise-cracking, crime-busting partners Riggs and Murtaugh in this blistering, all-action sequel. This time they tangle with evil South Africans - headed by slimy Joss Ackland - running drugs under the shelter of diplomatic immunity. Joe Pesci makes a big impression as Leo Getz, a snitch who never shuts up ("Whatever you want - Leo Getz!" ) while perennial starlet Patsy Kensit plays Riggs' Africaaner love interest.

includedAssets.title: Lethal Weapon 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover are back in buddy action as mismatched LA detectives Riggs and Murtaugh in a breathless caper that sees them on a mission to bust a corrupt cop who's involved in the arms racket. More rat-a-tat action and quickfire exchanges, with Rene Russo's foxy fellow officer providing a romantic target for Riggs and Joe Pesci on sidekick duty as Leo Getz, the snitch who never shuts up ("Whatever you want, Leo Getz!" ).
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover return as Riggs and Murtaugh, this time on the trail of an ex-cop turned ruthless crime lord. Classic action comedy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover are back in buddy action as mismatched LA detectives Riggs and Murtaugh in a breathless caper that sees them on a mission to bust a corrupt cop who's involved in the arms racket. More rat-a-tat action and quickfire exchanges, with Rene Russo's foxy fellow officer providing a romantic target for Riggs and Joe Pesci on sidekick duty as Leo Getz, the snitch who never shuts up ("Whatever you want, Leo Getz!" ).

includedAssets.title: Lethal Weapon 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Maverick LA cop duo Mel Gibson and Danny Glover tangle with Hong Kong triad gangster Jet Li in the last hurrah for the all-action series. Regular director Richard Donner keeps his foot on the accelerator with another round of explosive set-pieces while Chris Rock joins comedy sidekick Joe Pesci and the boys to keep the banter at maximum velocity. This is one franchise that goes out with a bang!
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover return to trade bullets and banter with Triad kingpin Jet Li. Joe Pesci, Rene Russo and Chris Rock get in on the action.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Maverick LA cop duo Mel Gibson and Danny Glover tangle with Hong Kong triad gangster Jet Li in the last hurrah for the all-action series. Regular director Richard Donner keeps his foot on the accelerator with another round of explosive set-pieces while Chris Rock joins comedy sidekick Joe Pesci and the boys to keep the banter at maximum velocity. This is one franchise that goes out with a bang!

includedAssets.title: Lethal Weapon Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Veteran Danny Glover and young maverick Mel Gibson are the bickering cop team who must learn to work together to thwart drug-smuggling operations and take down crime lords.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Veteran Danny Glover and young maverick Mel Gibson are the bickering cop team who must work together to beat drug-smugglers and take down crime lords.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Veteran Danny Glover and young maverick Mel Gibson are the bickering cop team who must learn to work together to thwart drug-smuggling operations and take down crime lords.
